summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AdvocacyFlow Slack-to-WhatsApp sharing prototype. All core features working correctly including dashboard with 3 sample posts, message cards with proper structure, action buttons with toast notifications, phone verification flow, OTP modal, and event tracking. Backend APIs all functional, frontend responsive design working across devices.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (/api/) returns correct response
Posts endpoint returns 3 sample posts with all required fields
Phone verification endpoint sends OTP successfully
OTP confirmation endpoint validates codes correctly
User phone check endpoint works for non-existent users
WhatsApp send endpoint correctly rejects unverified users
Event tracking endpoint logs actions successfully
Dashboard loads with proper AdvocacyFlow branding and subtitle
3 message cards display with correct structure (avatar, name, timestamp, channel, content)
Action buttons (Like, Re-share, Comment) work and show toast notifications
Send to WhatsApp button opens phone modal for first-time users
Phone number input validation works (rejects invalid, accepts valid)
OTP modal opens after valid phone submission with 6-digit input
OTP verification shows proper error for invalid codes
Design follows guidelines with Manrope/Inter fonts and Indigo color scheme
All images load successfully (5/5 images)
Post links are present and functional
Responsive design works on tablet (768x1024) and mobile (390x844) viewports
Event tracking works for all actions (like, reshare, comment)
Toast notifications display correctly for user actions

success_percentage.integration: 100% (phone verification flow, event tracking, API calls)
